html:
7.11.17  5:50 pm   Do you usually prefer to use universal/cultural symbols,

     do you like to develop your own,

     or what balance between?

7.11.17  5:48 pm   this isn't a question but I'm a big fan and I think your work is interesting and thought provoking. Okay kind of a question: doesn't it get tiring when people are constantly telling you "you really ought to do X to be more successful"??

     I bet it does. You shouldn't listen to those people. You got here without their advice, and you'll keep going without it too.
7.11.17  5:36 pm   why dont you use uppercase letters in your writing?

7.11.17  5:04 pm   Hey (a little late, I know), but i've just noticed that both of your last songs have a pretty standard verse-chorus form, which was something you struggled to achieve earlier, if i understood things correctly. So how did happen now? Did it just come naturally or you figured out the way to make that kind of system work for you?
7.11.17  4:50 pm   How do you make such witty and entertaining comedy
7.11.17  4:45 pm   have you ever had writer's block (or something similar), and if you have, how did you overcome it?

7.11.17  3:59 pm   Why are you against the selling of merchandise? It is specifically because of making money on what you believe shouldn't

      or do you just not think Bill Wurtz merch is reasonable to exist right now?

     Oh and bonus question for fun, what would that mean for the Bill Wurtz band if it comes into fruition? Would there be any problems with that idea due to costs and payment or I am over thinking your pseudo policy on creation and money making?

7.11.17  1:38 pm   How can we, ♫Your loving and grateful fans♪ help you to do your thing so you can do your thing?
7.11.17  1:10 pm   in the video "hi, im steve", why does a bird bring the mail to steve (that's not his name but whatever) if you already had a mailwoman character?

7.11.17  10:58 am   you're the only person that seems very pessimistic and very optimistic at the same time. but i can't tell if you're in the middle, i'm not sure how realistic you are. what are you?
7.11.17  10:07 am   do you believe in the right for soda cans to have their own seats on airplanes

7.11.17  8:59 am   Do you dislike clothing with symbols, text or other pictures on them?
7.11.17  7:46 am   why don't you look at your videos after they're released, or even want to look at them?

7.11.17  7:45 am   Hey bill, I asked the question about 1/4 time signatures yesterday (7/10).. you're right that a 1/4 time signature would make each measure only have 1 beat.. but what I mean is, why even break a song up into measures, grouping beats together into 3 or 4 (or whatever) instead of just letting each beat stand alone? I know you can write a song in multiple time signatures anyways.. but I say cut out the middle man, just think tempo/pulse of individual beats instead of grouping beats together.
7.11.17  6:20 am   Why does the "email" page only have a b?
7.11.17  6:07 am   did you know that you have free will and that it doesnt matter what people think of how long the time is in between released content?
7.11.17  6:02 am   why is your content so original

7.11.17  5:15 am   Hi Bill! As an avid musician and songwriter, I seriously draw a lot of inspiration from your works, it gives me a very good feeling inside. I just wanted to ask, are you ever going to put "you're free to do whatever you want to" on iTunes?
7.11.17  5:07 am   What do you do in your spare time except making content, eating, sleeping, drinking etc.

7.11.17  5:04 am   if selling merchandise doesn't feel good to you (which i totally understand btw), but you still sort of have to do it, would you think donating the money you'd get from that to charities would help? or is it so that the money isn't the problem but the merch itself is?

7.11.17  4:31 am   hi,
about the merch, you know the very vast majority of your fans (i'm not sure you're comfortable with that word, but anyways), are really nice and because of this odd one to one and very close and relatable connection you have with us, most people myself included would more than gladly help you for free for any matter, be it helping with merch design, site maintenance/improvement, anything i can think about really.
it bums be out to see you get the feeling of being overwhelmed by this merch thing bec
7.11.17  4:02 am   do you have a patreon?

7.11.17  1:33 am   Okay, first off: I absolutely love your videos! You are honestly one of my favorite Youtubers because despite most of your content being short, they always have a clever edge to them that makes me laugh on even my saddest days. Now, on that note, what inspired you to make the history of Japan video specifically? That video is how I found out about you and your other vids, so I'm genuinely curious! :)
